scripts.db:create: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE simplecrm;"
scripts.db:run:migrations: cat backend/prisma/migrations/001_initial_schema.sql | docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d simplecrm && cat backend/prisma/migrations/002_update_user_roles.sql | docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d simplecrm
scripts.db:setup: npm run docker:db:start && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:sync:prisma: cd backend && npm run prisma:pull && cd ..
scripts.db:setup:hard: npm run docker:down:hard && npm run docker:db:start && npm run db:create && npm run db:run:migrations
